* Dinobot saw another broken twig but ignored it , he was coming up to a 
stream and could smell Tavatron's sent. It was strong here, which meant that 
she either stayed for a while or doubled back a few yards. But, her sent 
ended at the stream edge and he knew that it would almost be imposable to 
track her from here...unless.
Dinobot looked up at one of the giant trees and then over at the other side 
of the stream, could she have jumped across?He looked at the shore of the 
stream and walked down it a little, he knew that she was a wolf and 
thus...had fur. He had a little trick to finding out if a furry creature 
went down stream in the water, he knew that they shed, even if just a 
little.
If a furry creature went into the water then the loose fur would come off 
and collect on the shore in the direction un which they went. The fur would 
keep collecting on the shore until that creature got out, THAT would betray 
the location in which a hunter could start searching again!
Dinobot saw no fur as he looked but as he came back to the spot that 
Tavatron's sent ended he did see a small brown hair. She'd jumped!!
Dinobot looked up and across the stream with a loud snarl, he'd heard her 
howl only a few cycles ago but it still rang in his mechanisms.
He looked up at the trees again and steadied his stance*

" Dinobot, MAXIMIZE!!"

* Now transformed he stepped back, aimed his laser sight and fired at the 
trunk of a near by tree. The tree snapped and toppled across the stream, 
Dinobot wasted no time in crossing the log bridge.
He hopped off and looked out into the trees that now surrounded him, 
Tavatron was out there somewhere and he was going to find her!*
